# prompt_templates

The prompt templates module for LLM interactions.

This module defines the prompt templates used in LLM interactions, which are written as
python functions.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/index" symbolName="AsyncContextPromptTemplate" /> AsyncContextPromptTemplate

An asynchronous context prompt template function.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/index" symbolName="AsyncPromptTemplate" /> AsyncPromptTemplate

An asynchronous prompt template function.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/index" symbolName="ContextPromptTemplate" /> ContextPromptTemplate

A context prompt template function.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/index" symbolName="DynamicConfig" /> DynamicConfig

Class for specifying dynamic configuration in a prompt template method.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/index" symbolName="PromptTemplate" /> PromptTemplate

A prompt template function.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/index" symbolName="prompt_template" /> prompt_template

Prompt template decorator for writing messages as a string template.
